1.title: The Beginning
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: "Mr. India tells the story of a shy, nerdy college teen, Ayush, who get super-powered suit that lets him get invisible and still being able to see everything around him. He doesn't realize his superpowers till he accidently travels while wearing this strange suit, to a different world which guides him about his responsibility of acquiring this suit and as a person to save the world. He learns a lot from the guardians about this different parallel world moving along with his world. And he also gets to know that there are negative strong powers which are being channelized and intended to destroy this world. Being unaware and lost in his own world, Ayush doesn't really understand what he can do for the world. Besides, Ayush loves a girl in his neighborhood but always gets into a tragedy whenever he come close to her. After knowing about his power to get invisible, he first uses his new found powers to put the guys down who have bullied him in front of his crush. But after his father got murdered at the hands of a criminal that he failed to stop, he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his father."
imdb.title: Mr India Superhero
plot: "Mr. India tells the story of a shy, nerdy college teen, Ayush, who get super-powered suit that lets him get invisible and still being able to see everything around him. He doesn't realize his superpowers till he accidently travels while wearing this strange suit, to a different world which guides him about his responsibility of acquiring this suit and as a person to save the world. He learns a lot from the guardians about this different parallel world moving along with his world. And he also gets to know that there are negative strong powers which are being channelized and intended to destroy this world. Being unaware and lost in his own world, Ayush doesn't really understand what he can do for the world. Besides, Ayush loves a girl in his neighborhood but always gets into a tragedy whenever he come close to her. After knowing about his power to get invisible, he first uses his new found powers to put the guys down who have bullied him in front of his crush. But after his father got murdered at the hands of a criminal that he failed to stop, he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his father."::Dushyant Kapoor
